Michael Deiter 4 Yd Run (Rafael Gaglianone Kick)

videos.headline: Wisconsin defense comes up with early interception
videos.description: Cam Thomas' pass on third down is picked off by Derrick Tindal and returned for nine yards to stall Illinois' drive.

videos.headline: Taylor breaks for powerful 29-yard run
videos.description: Jonathan Taylor runs to the outside and takes advantage of miss tackles on his 29-yard gain to move Wisconsin down field.

videos.headline: Badgers strike first with 1-yard TD run
videos.description: Alec Ingold runs up the middle to score the one yard touchdown to put Wisconsin up at the end of the first quarter.

videos.headline: Hornibrook makes bad decision and is picked off
videos.description: Alex Hornibrook drops back and throws the ball right to Bennett Williams who intercepts it and tacks on a 20-yard return for Illinois.

videos.headline: Wisconsin defense answers with forced fumble
videos.description: After the Badgers turnover, Tyler Johnson sacks Jeff George Jr. from behind and forced a fumble to give Wisconsin the ball back in the second quarter.

videos.headline: Knight ejected on targeting call
videos.description: Quintez Cephus hauls in a 13 yard pass and James Knight tackles him late and is ejected on a targeting penalty.

videos.headline: Badgers add on a 2-yard TD run
videos.description: Garrett Groshek punches it in from the 2-yard line to add to Wisconsin's lead in the second quarter.

videos.headline: Badger defense gets to Thomas for a sack
videos.description: Cam Thomas is sacked by Alec James for a loss of 8 yards which forces a third and long situation for Illinois.

videos.headline: George Jr. makes big throw under pressure
videos.description: Jeff George Jr. avoids pressure and throws a perfect pass to Malik Turner for a 29-yard gain to move the Fighting Illini down field.

videos.headline: Thomas throws second interception
videos.description: Cam Thomas throws a long pass and it is intercepted by Joe Ferguson and he returns it for 37 yards.

videos.headline: Badgers get fancy with trick play TD
videos.description: Alex Hornibrook throws a screen pass to left tackle Michael Deiter and he runs 4 yards into the end zone to add to Wisconsin's lead.

videos.headline: Deiter talks trick play TD at the end of the game
videos.description: Michael Deiter admits he was nervous when he found out he was getting the ball on a trick play, but was confident that he could get it in the end zone in Wisconsin's 24-10 win over Illinois.
